articles.title: Australian Open 2021: Naomi Osaka on her powerful US Open Black Lives Matter protest - The Age
articles.description: Naomi Osaka has revealed why she wore masks with the names of police shooting victims during last year’s US Open – and talks about her hopes for the future under a new US president.
articles.content: By the time the US Open rolled around a week later, the Japanese-born daughter of a Haitian father and Japanese mother went from tennis prodigy to poster girl of the Black Lives Matter movement, not … [+5906 chars]
